source_objects.title: Industry
source_objects.description: Break into new industries from healthcare, to veterinary medicine or event planning.

items.title: Professional Report Writing for Junior Engineers
items.headline: A concise guide on how to write technical reports and avoid making common mistakes
objectives_summary: You will be able to write accurate and concise reports that get your message across
Make sure your reports get read
Make the right impression

items.title: Regulatory Affairs & Medical Writing
items.headline: Expand your opportunities and CV
objectives_summary: How to create a registration dossier
How to provide a qualified assessment of clinical documents
How to develop an understanding of language fundamentals and style-guide conventions

items.title: Distillation columns : Principles , Operation & Design
items.headline: A complete understanding of construction details and functioning of distilling columns for successful operation
objectives_summary: Understand the thermodynamics of Vapor Liquid Equilibria for pure components and mixtures
Know, understand and master the concepts necessary to optimize the operation of your distillation column
Know about all parameters and profiles for the analysis of your distillation column operation

items.title: Business of Solar for Students and Professionals

visible_instructors.name: Syed Shaheer
visible_instructors.title: Syed Shaheer Aziz
visible_instructors.job_title: Renewable Energy Developer and Solar Educator

items.headline: Cost Per watt? kWh/kWp? Solar Irradiance? Power-Purchase Agreement? Want to learn what these terms actually mean?
objectives_summary: Understand the energy infrastructure around you (i.e. electricity grid, types of fuels used to generate electricity, etc)
The major components of a solar array, and the process to build a solar array.
Key Terms utilized within the solar industry: NTP, CIA, $/Watt, System Production, etc.

items.title: Effective Expert Witnessing
items.headline: This course provides in-depth guidance for successful expert witness preparation.
objectives_summary: Participants will gain an understanding of the qualifications needed to become an expert
Gain helpful strategies for preparing an expert report.
Be able to deliver effective testimony at deposition and trial.

items.title: ePLAN Electric P8 - Custom Symbols / Tips And Tricks

visible_instructors.name: Ivan
visible_instructors.title: Ivan Vidovic
visible_instructors.job_title: Applied Electrical Design Courses and Tutorials

items.headline: Symbol libraries management, custom symbols, layer management, funtions to help you work more efficiently in EPLAN etc.
objectives_summary: To work with Layer Management in EPLAN (to see what layers in EPLAN can do for us)
To manage symbols and symbol libraries in EPLAN (create, adjust, new variant, import/export, delete etc.)
To work with the data within EPLAN project more effectively (Navigators, Edit in Table, Edit Properties Externally)

items.title: How to become a model: Modeling 101
items.headline: Tips and tricks from the fashion modeling, posing & Instagram branding
objectives_summary: How to become a model
Posing,  working with photographers
Find out what type of model you are

items.title: Halal Training Course
items.headline: Halal Quality Assurance in the Industry
objectives_summary: The basic concepts & requirements of Halal
The required documents on Halal procedures
The importance of proper sourcing of raw materials and production

items.title: Administer a Construction Contract

visible_instructors.job_title: Project Management for Building and Construction
visible_instructors.name: Exner
visible_instructors.title: Exner Education

items.headline: Learn the key elements of construction contracts, how to select the best contract and understand termination issues.
objectives_summary: Identify various types of building and construction contracts
Understand the legislative requirements of construction contracts
Learn essential terms and elements of valid contracts

items.title: Front Desk Safety and Security

visible_instructors.name: Captain Joe
visible_instructors.title: Captain Joe Puckett
visible_instructors.job_title: Human Behavior Analyst and Safety Expert

items.headline: Planning ahead for serious events including emergencies, natural disasters, intruders and threats of violence.
objectives_summary: By the end of this course you will develop ideas of what action you will take during emergencies.
By the end of this training you will learn to focus more on your surroundings.
Upon completion of this course you will learn terms and concepts to help you evaluate odd, suspicious and dangerous situations.

visible_instructors.title: AW Schultz, MBA, CMRP, LSSMBB, PMP

items.headline: 270 Exams Questions based on 2021 Exam
objectives_summary: CMRP Simulator is to help reliability and maintenance professionals who desire to get certified by SMRP
Learn to manage CMRP exam pace in long format exams
Understand the Pillars of CMRP

items.title: Beginning Aircraft Structures for Pilots

visible_instructors.display_name: William BG Harvey MSc, MDes, MSc
visible_instructors.name: William BG
visible_instructors.title: William BG Harvey MSc, MDes, MSc

items.headline: Learn the A to Z of modern Aircraft Structures and enhance your overall aviation knowledge, making you a better pilot.
objectives_summary: By the end of this course you will be able to describe in detail the construction and components of a typical modern transport aircraft and the forces affecting it both in the air and on the ground.
The effects of Aircraft Loads on a modern transport aircraft.
The components and construction of the aircraft fuselage including pressurisation.

items.title: Diagnosis Evolution: The ICD-9 to ICD-10 Transition

visible_instructors.job_title: Founder of the Sigil Social Foundation
visible_instructors.name: Nate
visible_instructors.title: Nate Fowler

items.headline: Everything you need to know about transitioning your practice, your billing, and your in-house medical records to ICD-10
objectives_summary: Understand the history of ICD and why we use it
Understand the structure of ICD-10
Be capable of filling out a revised CMS-1500 form's diagnosis section

items.title: Steam Boiler for Layman
items.headline: The Essential Fittings
objectives_summary: Explain and understand the basics of components on a boiler

items.title: Consulting Fees Guide: How to Increase Your Consulting Fees
items.headline: Learn how to set, negotiate and increase your consulting fees to grow your income with every consulting project.
objectives_summary: Understand the different consulting fee structures
Set your consulting fee with confidence
Increase your consulting fee and rate

items.title: The Solar PV System Design Comprehensive Course //P2
items.headline: Everything about sizing the PV system components, doing the necessery calculations, solvin problems and makin decisions.
objectives_summary: Calculate the panel efficiency, size and power output.
Calculate the impact of low and high temperature on the panel performance and safety.
Choose the right combiner box to connect to your panels and conduct the necessary calculations.
